mapper.select: select top 1 id_num,code,AppKey,AppSecret,access_token,refresh_token,user_id,org_id,app_name,update_time from XXX_code_token where AppKey = #{appKey}
select top 1 id_num,code,AppKey,AppSecret,access_token,refresh_token,user_id,org_id,app_name,update_time from XXX_code_token where AppKey = #{appKey} and mobile = #{mobile}

select TOP 1 Convert(decimal(18,2),sum(t2.taxamount)) as totalAmount, max(t3.name) as storename,max(t1.code) as code, MAX(CONVERT(varchar(100), t1.createdtime, 20)) as voucherdate, MAX(t4.AppKey) AS AppKey,max(t4.AppSecret) as AppSecret, max(t4.companytaxnum) as taxnum,max(t4.token) as token from re_retail t1,re_retail_b t2,AA_DR_Store t3,nuonuo_code_token t4 where t1.code = #{code} and t1.id = t2.idRetailDTO and t1.idstore = t3.id AND t3.iddistrict = t4.iddistrict group by t1.id
mapper.update: update nuonuo_code_token set token = #{newToken} where appKey = #{appKey}
mapper.select: select t3.name as goodsname,t2.quantity,t2.taxamount,t4.name as unitname,t3.priuserdefnvc1 as ssflbm from re_retail t1,re_retail_b t2 ,AA_inventory t3,AA_unit t4 where t1.id = t2.idRetailDTO and t1.code = #{code} and t2.idInventory = t3.id and t3.idUnit = t4.id
select access_token from XXX_code_token where AppKey = #{AppKey}

select t1.code,t2.idinventory,t3.code as inventoryCode,t2.id as iddetail,t3.idunit as unitname,t2.quantity,t2.origTaxPrice, t5.code as personcode,t4.code as departmentcode ,t6.code as partnercode ,t7.name as unitname,t2.id as sourceDetailId from SA_SaleOrder t1,SA_SaleOrder_b t2,AA_inventory t3,AA_Department t4,AA_Person t5,AA_PartnerEntity t6,AA_Unit t7 where t1.id = t2.idSaleOrderDTO and t1.code = #{code} and t2.idinventory= t3.id and t1.iddepartment = t4.id and t1.idclerk = t5.id and t1.idcustomer = t6.id and t3.idunit = t7.id

select t1.code,t2.idManufactureOrderDTO,t3.code as inventoryCode,t2.id as iddetail,t3.idunit as unitname,t2.quantity from MP_ManufactureOrder t1,MP_ManufactureOrder_b t2,AA_inventory t3 where t1.id = t2.idManufactureOrderDTO and t1.code = #{code} and t2.idinventory= t3.id
select t2.name as departMentName,t2.code as departMentCode,t1.name as clerkName,t1.code as clerkCode from AA_Person t1,AA_department t2 where t1.name = #{name} and t1.iddepartment = t2.id
select top 1 AppKey,AppSecret,access_token from XXX_code_token where officeid = #{officeid}
select top 1 t1.code ,t2.name as unitName from AA_inventoryEntity t1,AA_Unit t2 where t1.name = #{name} and t1.idUnit = t2.id

select t3.code as WarehouseCode,t1.code as ckinventoryCode, sum(t2.CanuseBaseQuantity) as AvailableQuantity, sum(t2.CanuseSubQuantity) as AvailableSubQuantity, max(k3.saleunitid) as saleunitid, max(k3.idbaseunit) as idbaseunit, max(t1.isBatch) as isbatch, t2.batch as Batch,t2.freeItem0 as freeitem0Value from AA_InventoryEntity t1,ST_CurrentStock t2 ,AA_Warehouse t3, (select k1.idinventory,max(k1.idunit) as saleunitid,max(k1.idbaseunit) as idbaseunit from SA_SaleDelivery_b k1,SA_SaleDelivery k2 where k1.idSaleDeliveryDTO = k2.id and k2.code = #{sacode} group by k1.idinventory )k3 where t1.id = t2.idinventory and t2.idwarehouse = t3.id and t1.code in ${inventoryCodes} and t2.idinventory = k3.idinventory and t2.CanuseBaseQuantity > 0 group by t3.code,t1.code,t2.batch,t2.freeItem0 order by t2.batch asc

select count(t3.id) as cct from SA_SaleDelivery t1,SA_SaleDelivery_b t2,SA_SaleInvoice_b t3 where t1.code = #{vourcherCode} and t1.id = t2.idSaleDeliveryDTO and t2.id = t3.sourceVoucherDetailId and t3.idsourcevouchertype = 104

select top 1 t4.code from SA_SaleDelivery t1,SA_SaleDelivery_b t2,SA_SaleInvoice_b t3,SA_SaleInvoice t4 where t1.code = #{vourcherCode} and t1.id = t2.idSaleDeliveryDTO and t2.id = t3.sourceVoucherDetailId and t3.idsourcevouchertype = 104 and t3.idSaleInvoiceDTO = t4.id
mapper.update: update t1 set t1.auditeddate = t3.auditeddate from ST_RDRecord t1,ST_RDRecord_b t2 ,SA_SaleDelivery t3,SA_SaleDelivery_b t4 where t1.id = t2.idRDRecordDTO and t2.sourceVoucherCode = t3.code and t3.id = t4.idSaleDeliveryDTO and t2.sourceVoucherDetailId = t4.id and t1.auditeddate != t3.auditeddate and t1.code = #{xsckdcode} and t3.code = #{vourcherCode}

update t1 set t1.auditeddate = t3.auditeddate from SA_SaleInvoice t1,SA_SaleInvoice_b t2 ,SA_SaleDelivery t3,SA_SaleDelivery_b t4 where t1.id = t2.idSaleInvoiceDTO and t2.sourceVoucherCode = t3.code and t3.id = t4.idSaleDeliveryDTO and t2.sourceVoucherDetailId = t4.id and t1.auditeddate != t3.auditeddate and t1.code = #{xxfpcode} and t3.code = #{vourcherCode}
mapper.select: select top 1 t4.code,t3.id as detailId from SA_SaleDelivery t1,SA_SaleDelivery_b t2,SA_SaleInvoice_b t3,SA_SaleInvoice t4,AA_inventory t5 where t1.code = #{sacode} and t1.id = t2.idSaleDeliveryDTO and t3.sourceVoucherCode = t1.code and t3.sourceVoucherDetailId = t2.id and t3.idSaleInvoiceDTO = t4.id and t2.idinventory = t5.id and t5.id = t3.idinventory and t5.code = #{inventorycode}
